name: Pinbattle
description:
Pinbattle is a cartoony pinball-based duel in which you have to beat your enemy by showing your best tricks on the board!

Credits:

Programming, game idea and game design by Elendow (Èric Verdalet)

2D art and UI design by Natnatart (Nat Morillo)

Music by Juhani Junkala.

SFX by prosoundfx,  applehillstudios,  FXyourself,  AlexM76 and HappyMusicHappySounds.

How to play: Special powers:

Darkness: the rival's board will be in darkness for some seconds.

Cancelled flippers: the rival's flippers won't work for some seconds.

Invisible ball: the rival's ball will be invisible for some seconds, but the ball will still running through the board.

Gravity falls: the ball's weight will increase for some seconds in rival's board so it will be harder to reach your board.

Controls:
